name: Honeypot WooCommerce – WordPress AntiSpam
author: Camilo

sections.description:
This plugin activates a honeypot (Anti-Spam and anti-bot) in the following sites:
-WooCommerce login form
-WooCommerce registration form
-Comments box of the post
-WordPress registration form
-WordPress login form

It is highly optimized, so that the performance of your website is not affected
sections.installation:
1. Download the repository plugin
  2. Activate the plugin from the WordPress menu
sections.changelog:
1.3.7 (25/08/2020)

Improve WPO

1.3.6 (25/08/2020)

New: Add tags
Removed unnecessary code and jquery

1.3.5 (25/08/2020)

New: WooCommerce 4.4.0 support
New: WordPress 5.5 support

1.3.4 (04/04/2020)

New: WooCommerce 4.0.0 support
New: WordPress 5.4 support

1.3.3 (11/09/2019)

New: WooCommerce 3.9.0 support
New: WordPress 5.3 support

1.3.2 (11/09/2019)

New: WooCommerce 3.7.0 support

1.3.1 (14/07/2019)

Fix: Many bugs
Improvement: More difficulties for bots

1.3.0 (08/05/2019)

New: WordPress 5.2 support
Improvement: More conditional load to improve the speed
Fix: Many bugs
Improvement: More difficulties for bots

1.2

Fix: Notice PHP when debug mode is activated
New: Display none is hidden
New: When the wp_die is displayed, a 200 response is sent (To confuse the bots)
New: WooCommerce 3.6.1 support
Fixed minor fixes

1.1

New: Protection against mass creation of users (Only activated if you allow user registration)
New: WooCommerce 3.6.0 RC3 support

1.0

Initial version
